sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-form>
      <v-input v-model="tarefa.title"></v-input>
    </v-form>
    <v-btn :to="{ name: 'TasksList' }">Voltar</v-btn>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => {
    return {
      tarefa: {
        title: "",
        project: "",
      },
    };
  },
  created() {
    this.tarefa.title = this.$route.params.tarefa.title;
    this.tarefa.project = this.$route.params.tarefa.project;
  },
};
</script>
